Keywords: Masters of Evil , Ruler , Soldier , Thunderbolts
Real Name: Helmut Zemo
Special Powers
RECRUITER: POWER: Choose a character with the Masters of Evil keyword in your KO area that hasn't been chosen for or generated by a Recruiter effect. If you do, generate a character with the Masters of Evil keyword from your Sideline that has a lower point value than the chosen character. This game, the generated character can't be replaced and your opponent scores them immediately instead of when they're KO'd.
YOUR STRATEGY IS PATHETIC COMPARED TO MINE: Leadership, Outwit.

October 16, 2022
AdamWarlock
@Goop this isn't exclusively a close combat piece though. With 6 range and outwit on every click, he's effectively got psychic blast whenever you need it. Plus the Masters of Evil TA encourages having figures adjacent so Mastermind is intuitive.
January 27, 2022
Goop
I'm generally not a huge fan of mastermind on close combat pieces, its often hard to find fodder to send dmg to. I can't think of who this guy really pairs well with to pull that off. I guess you are mostly using him for the recruiter ability anyway so best to play him at his lower line for it and hide him somewhere.
